plan_steps: 1) Immediately activate grace period extension and contact customer within 24 hours to discuss financial hardship options. [Doc#5]
2) Assign dedicated agent for personalized outreach and explore premium reduction options through coverage adjustments or discounts. [Doc#1]
3) Leverage long-term loyalty with exclusive retention offers, anniversary bonuses, and recognition of 86-month tenure value. [Doc#3]
